original_text: The king told all the people who were in Jerusalem and the people of Benjamin's tribe to stand. He told them to promise to obey God's laws. So the people who lived in Jerusalem agreed to obey the covenant of God, the God of their ancestors.
korean_text: 예루살렘과 베냐민에 있는 자들이 다 여기에 참여하게 하매 예루살렘 주민이 하나님 곧 그의 조상들의 하나님의 언약을 따르니라

sentences.original_text: The king told all the people who were in Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 왕은 예루살렘에 있는 모든 백성에게 명령했습니다

sentences.original_text: and the people of Benjamin's tribe to stand
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 베냐민 지파의 백성들에게 자리에서 일어서라고 했습니다

sentences.original_text: He told them to promise to obey God's laws
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들에게 하나님의 법을 지킬 것을 약속하라고 했습니다

sentences.original_text: So the people who lived in Jerusalem
agreed to obey the covenant of God
